content: work row 1 and 2 1 time +6 sts row 3 sl1 k to first p st k1 p13 k1 repeat in st pattern to end repeat the 2 row sequence in two colors row 4 as row 2 9 more times for a total of 10 times worked in each color 146 sts repeat row 3 and 4 2 more times and cut c3 yarn 282 sts working 4 row stripes in increase method bottom border third increase c3 c1 - work row 1 1 time +4 sts c1 - work row 2 1 time +2 sts row 1 rs sl1 k13 pk repeat in stitch repeat row 1 and 2 one more time 158 sts pattern to end 302 sts row 2 ws sl1 p14 k1 repeat in stitch c2 - work row 1 as row 1 1 time +4 sts pattern to end c2 - work row 2 as row 2 1 time +2 sts row 3 sl1 k to p st k1 p13 k1 repeat in repeat row 1 and 2 one more time +170 sts st pattern row 4 as row 2 repeat the entire above sequence in both colors 3 more times for a total of 4 times repeat row 3 and 4 2 more times and worked 242 sts cut c3 yarn 302 sts bind off enjoy your cozy shawl starting on rs of shawl first purl one row then bind off loosely with c1 and c2 yarns held together weave in ends blocking is optional i did not block my shawl web yarnz2go myshopify com/ email yarnz2go@gmail com ravelry petrabreakstone © petra breakstone enjoy the knit page 2 of 2
